verses.verse: And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, even for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>: and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And all the <S%H2691>villages<s%> that were round <S%H5439>about<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H1192>Baalathbeer<s%>, <S%H7414>Ramath<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%>. Out of the <S%H2256>portion<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>: for the <S%H2506>part<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was too <S%H7227>much<s%> for them: therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> had their <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of them.

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> toward the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and <S%H4831>Maralah<s%>, and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H1708>Dabbasheth<s%>, and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to the <S%H5158>river<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3362>Jokneam<s%>;

And <S%H7725>turned<s%> from <S%H8301>Sarid<s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%> <S%H8121><s%> unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3696>Chislothtabor<s%>, and then goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1705>Daberath<s%>, and goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3309>Japhia<s%>,

And <S%H487>Alammelech<s%>, and <S%H6008>Amad<s%>, and <S%H4861>Misheal<s%>; and <S%H6293>reacheth<s%> to <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, and to <S%H7884>Shihorlibnath<s%>;

Tzor
<S%H5981>Ummah<s%> also, and <S%H663>Aphek<s%>, and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%>: <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> too little for them: therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3959>Leshem<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein, and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3959>Leshem<s%>, <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>.

This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

When they had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of dividing the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> by their <S%H1367>coasts<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them:

According to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> him the <S%H5892>city<s%> which he <S%H7592>asked<s%>, even <S%H8556>Timnathserah<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: and he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein.

These are the <S%H5159>inheritances<s%>, which <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, divided for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>. So they made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2505>dividing<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%>.
